name: Taddy's Adventure
description:
My first attempt at using Bitsy and at a digital game! Inspired by my mother's hope to travel around the world I wanted to make a game where you get to relax and see a few things. 

This is currently a work in progress, but I plan to add more to China and Switzerland, as well as adding Egypt, Italy, Vietnam and Lapland. This is more of a passion project, but as this was born out of not being able to afford gifts I figured I may as well. 

I hope you enjoy and feel free to inform me on what needs to be added to really make the countries feel right and anything extra the game as a whole could use!
